text:
Ah... um...
It's just that... it's almost... time...

The debut live performance...
I'm getting nervous... after all...

I see... yeah.
Feeling nervous is normal, I think.

But... Kiriko, you've worked so hard.
I've seen it myself.

And besides, Kiriko, you have your friends.
Even if you feel like you can't do anything... I'm here too.

So, if you ever feel anxious,
you can rely on those around you.

Yes...
I have everyone with me...!

And... with you here, Producer...
I'm sure everything will be okay...

So... please...
Always, always... watch over me.

—Ah, of course!
Let's keep working hard together from now on.
